name: video_related_contents
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube.
Tool description: With the YouTube Data API, you can add various YouTube features to your app. Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
API description: Fetches related video contents from YouTube using the RapidAPI service.

cursor.description: Token for pagination to retrieve the next set of results.

is_id.description: The YouTube video ID for which related contents are to be fetched (default is 'kJQP7kiw5Fk').

gl.description: Country code for the response (default is 'US').

hl.description: Language code for the response (default is 'en').
